elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: I gain 1 boost per Mana Orb in your Mana Zone.  {J} You may pay {1}. If you do: You may send to Reserve any number of target Characters with total {M} of 4 or less.
